query:
SELECT EXISTS(
            SELECT 1 FROM projects p
            WHERE p.id = $1 AND (
                p.owner_user_id = $2
                OR EXISTS(
                    SELECT 1 FROM team_members tm
                    WHERE tm.team_id = p.owner_team_id
                    AND tm.user_id = $2
                )
            )
        ) as "exists!"
